summary: A group of men and women with disabilities come together to star in a unique new western film in which they have the leading roles.
cast: Vanessa Halby|Peter Halby|Ila Halby|Ajani A.J. Murray|Jeremy Vest|Alec Bandler|Zack Gottsagen|Steve Kutasz|Peter Lazarus|Will Halby|Suzi Barrett|Dominique Dauwe|Karina Deyko|Judy Moscariello|Judi Muskrat
title: Becoming Bulletproof
